GlobalValueSet.description: New: Transient state when record is first created Registered: Are in the system as a potential donor Verified: Has filled out basic profile information and have passed initial criteria Applicant: Has an appointment to assess their fitness for donation Eligible: Has met all criteria for donation and Eligiblity datetime is today or in the past Deferred: Has met all critieria for donation and Eligibility datetime is in the future Excluded: Can never* give plasma for various reasons that are PHI
